channel.title: Posts on Kathryn Whelan
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Kathryn Whelan

item.title: File Names To CSV
item.description: One major part of this project has been how to collect all the data and format it to create items and collections.

item.title: Github Pages and Actions
item.description: Github actions along with Github Pages has made it so simple to update my site as I continue to create and update content.

item.title: Take and Store Photos
item.description: When an image is not available for an item, or a user would like to add a custom image, they can take a photo from their phone.

item.title: Keyboard Placement
item.description: To improve the user experience on the edit page I wanted the fields to move up the height of the keyboard when the user selected a textfield at the bottom of the page.

item.title: Hugo
item.description: Setting up a basic site with Hugo and adding a theme was super fast, however as I add more content I have run into a few issues that I will address here.

item.title: Refactoring
item.description: Originally I had multiple collection types of Books, Movies and Dvds.

item.title: Tab Bar
item.description: One of the core components of my application was the tab bar controller to allow the user to switch from the collections section to the search functionality.

item.title: Scroll View
item.description: Getting the scrollview to work for me took multiple attempts.

item.title: Firebase - Data Upload
item.description: View the uploader files on Github One of the key components of my application is the ability to search collections of items.

item.title: Cloud Functions
item.description: After using test data in Algolia to make sure results were retuning properly I set up Cloud Functions to trigger when items are added, updated or deleted to the Firestore collection.

item.title: Forms Using a Stack View
item.description: My original form setup was static; all the fields were pinned.

item.title: Custom Alert
item.description: To add a new collection I added a custom alert that allows the user to type in a collection name and collection type.

item.title: Algolia
item.description: I chose to add Algolia to my project after learning that I would not be able to do a full text search search with Firebase.

item.title: Firebase
item.description: Since I used firebase for a few of the course tutorials I decided I would stick with it for my app.

item.title: SwiftUI
item.description: Through the Udemy tutorial I was able to try out SwiftUI.

item.title: Design Tools
item.description: Choosing Colors Color Hunt Creating Icons App Icon Generator Canva

item.title: Swift
item.description: The Complete IOS App Development Bootcamp on Udemy Checkout Github to see my completed work for this course This course started out by recreating the single page app "

item.title: Kotlin
item.description: The Complete Android 10 & Development Masterclass on Udemy Check out Github to see my completed work for this course This course had a great range of projects from classic Hello World to a fully functioning Trello application.
